review: ** ** ** ************* *** having great explanation skills. I contacted him regarding my sister's rbs count. She was admitted in a hospital where she had diagonesd with hypertension and diabtec type 2. We were so panicked after seeing her reports so I contacted him by using practo . He explained me everything about rbs. If you are diabetic , your rbs should be more than 200, but my sister rbs was 132 . It is normal. while she was admitted in my locality hospital where she was injected with wrong injection due to this, she suffered severe side effects. That time I also contacted him, he helped me. I will recommend to all you without hesitation , you can take appointments. I am sure , you will definitely your story and about him.

Very homely and cooperative. Easily approachable, patient and responds to all calls.  Takes personal interest and treats the underlying cause of the disease thoroughly. Also provides cost effective remedies. Lucky to have one such doctor.
Approach towards the patient is very good,Gives in-depth knowledge of disease to the patients,Gives proper guidance.

** **** ** * **** **** ******* He listens to the concerns of the patient. I consulted him when I'm diagnosed with diabetis in January 2022 he suggested me good medication and suggestions to maintain my sugar levels. I was so depressed and worried before, but after zaid's consultation I am feeling good and confident. I recommend everyone to go for consultation with Dr Zaid.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. Glad to be of help.

review: Doctor is very friendly and understanding He explained it very clearly in fact he drew in his tablet and taught me basic metrics of diabetes and what are the normal levels Among doctors who just take 2mins in video call in practo he is outstanding and takes more time to explain very detailed and makes the patients understand importantly Thanks you sir .
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. Glad to be of help.
